ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_SWPORTA_DR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Values written to this register are output on the I/O signals for Port A if the corresponding data direction bits for Port A are set to Output mode and the corresponding control bit for Port A is set to Software mode. The value read back is equal to the last value written to this register. Reset Value: GPIO_SWPORTA_RESET

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_SWPORTA_DR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_SWPORTA_DR Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_SWPORTA_DDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Values written to this register independently control the direction of the corresponding data bit in Port A. The default direction can be configured as input or output after system reset through the GPIO_DFLT_DIR_A parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_SWPORTA_DDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_SWPORTA_DDR Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Name: Interrupt enable register Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
Allows each bit of Port A to be configured for interrupts. By default the generation of interrupts is disabled. Whenever a 1 is written to a bit of this register, it configures the corresponding bit on Port A to become an interrupt; otherwise, Port A operates as a normal GPIO signal. Interrupts are disabled on the corresponding bits of Port A if the corresponding data direction register is set to Output or if Port A mode is set to Hardware.
Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_INTEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_INTEN Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTMASK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt mask register Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTMASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Controls whether an interrupt on Port A can create an interrupt for the interrupt controller by not masking it. By default, all interrupts bits are unmasked. Whenever a 1 is written to a bit in this register, it masks the interrupt generation capability for this signal; otherwise interrupts are allowed through. The unmasked status can be read as well as the resultant status after masking. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_INTMASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_INTMASK Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTTYPE_LEVEL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt level Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTTYPE_LEVEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Controls the type of interrupt that can occur on Port A. Whenever a 0 is written to a bit of this register, it configures the interrupt type to be level-sensitive; otherwise, it is edge-sensitive. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_INTTYPE_LEVEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_INTTYPE_LEVEL Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_INT_POLARITY
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt polarity Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_INT_POLARITY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Controls the polarity of edge or level sensitivity that can occur on input of Port A. Whenever a 0 is written to a bit of this register, it configures the interrupt type to falling-edge or active-low sensitive; otherwise, it is rising-edge or active-high sensitive. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_INT_POLARITY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_INT_POLARITY Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTSTATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt status Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_INTSTATUS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Interrupt status of Port A. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_INTSTATUS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_INTSTATUS Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_RAW_INTSTATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Raw interrupt status Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_RAW_INTSTATUS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Raw interrupt of status of Port A (premasking bits) Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_RAW_INTMASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_RAW_INTMASK Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_PORTA_EOI
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Port A clear interrupt register Note: This register is available only if Port A is configured to generate interrupts (GPIO_PORTA_INTR = Include (1)) and when the debounce logic is included (GPIO_DEBOUNCE = Include (1)).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_PORTA_EOI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Controls the clearing of edge type interrupts from Port A. When a 1 is written into a corresponding bit of this register, the interrupt is cleared. All interrupts are cleared when Port A is not configured for interrupts. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_PORTA_EOI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_PORTA_EOI Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_EXT_PORTA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This register always reflects the signals value on the External Port A. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_EXT_PORTA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_EXT_PORTA Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_LS_SYNC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writing a 1 to this register results in all level-sensitive interrupts being synchronized to pclk_intr. Reset Value: 0x0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_LS_SYNC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_LS_SYNC Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_ID_CODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This is a user-specified code that a system can read. It can be used for chip identification, and so on. Reset Value: GPIO_ID_NUM

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_VER_ID_CODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: ASCII value for each number in the version, followed by *. For example 32_31_32_2A represents the version 2.12*. Reset Value: See the releases table in the Release Notes

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_CONFIG_REG2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: GPIO Configuration Register 2 This register is a read-only register that is present when the configuration parameter GPIO_ADD_ENCODED_PARAMS is set to True. If this configuration is set to False, then this register reads back 0. Reset Value: ((GPIO_ADD_ENCODED_PARAMS==1'b0) ? 32'h0 : {12'h0, `GPIO_ENCODED_PWIDTH_D, `GPIO_ENCODED_PWIDTH_C, `GPIO_ENCODED_PWIDTH_B, `GPIO_ENCODED_PWIDTH_A})

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENCODED_ID_PWIDTH_A
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PWIDTH_A configuration parameter.
0x0 = 8 bits
0x1 = 16 bits
0x2 = 32 bits
0x3 = Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENCODED_ID_PWIDTH_B
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PWIDTH_B configuration parameter.
0x0 = 8 bits
0x1 = 16 bits
0x2 = 32 bits
0x3 = Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENCODED_ID_PWIDTH_C
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PWIDTH_C configuration parameter.
0x0 = 8 bits
0x1 = 16 bits
0x2 = 32 bits
0x3 = Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENCODED_ID_PWIDTH_D
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PWIDTH_D configuration parameter. 0x0 = 8 bits
0x1 = 16 bits
0x2 = 32 bits
0x3 = Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_CONFIG_REG2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_CONFIG_REG2 Reserved bits - read as zero

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_CONFIG_REG1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: GPIO Configuration Register 1 This register is present when the configuration parameter GPIO_ADD_ENCODED_PARAMS is set to True. If this parameter is set to False, this register reads back zero (0). Reset Value: GPIO_CID_RESET_REG1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: APB_DATA_WIDTH
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_APB_DATA_WIDTH configuration parameter. Note: 0x3 = Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_PORTS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_NUM_PORT configuration parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PORTA_SINGLE_CTL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PORTA_SINGLE_CTL configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTA is not controlled from a single source

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTA is controlled from a single source

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PORTB_SINGLE_CTL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PORTB_SINGLE_CTL configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTB is not controlled from a single source

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTB is controlled from a single source

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PORTC_SINGLE_CTL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PORTC_SINGLE_CTL configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTC is not controlled from a single source

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTC is controlled from a single source

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PORTD_SINGLE_CTL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PORTD_SINGLE_CTL configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTD is not controlled from a single source

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORTD is controlled from a single source

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HW_PORTA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_HW_PORTA configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port A has external, auxiliary hardware signals excluded

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port A has external, auxiliary hardware signals included

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HW_PORTB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_HW_PORTB configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port B has external, auxiliary hardware signals excluded

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port B has external, auxiliary hardware signals included

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HW_PORTC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_HW_PORTC configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port C has external, auxiliary hardware signals excluded

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port C has external, auxiliary hardware signals included

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HW_PORTD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_HW_PORTD configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port D has external, auxiliary hardware signals excluded

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Port D has external, auxiliary hardware signals included

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PORTA_INTR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_PORTA_INTR configuration parameter.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORT A is not used as an interrupt source

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: PORT A is required to be used as an interrupt source

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEBOUNCE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_DEBOUNCE configuration parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ADD_ENCODED_PARAMS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_ADD_ENCODED_PARAMS configuration parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPIO_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_ID configuration parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENCODED_ID_WIDTH
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_ID_WIDTH configuration parameter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INTERRUPT_BOTH_EDGE_TYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The value of this register is derived from the GPIO_INT_BOTH_EDGE configuration parameter

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Interrupt generation on rising or falling edge

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:displayName: Interrupt generation on both rising and falling edge

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RSVD_GPIO_CONFIG_REG1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RSVD_GPIO_CONFIG_REG1 Reserved bits - read as zero
